data.title: Interconnections amongst Anamorphs and their Possible Contribution to Ascomycete Systematics
data.meta_description: Previous attempts at syntheses between ascomycete classifications and systems proposed for deuteromycetes (mainly based on conidiogenesis) are reviewed. Problems surrounding previous and current attempts at correlative work are emphasized. The relationships between...
